member.name: T:IGExtensions.Common.Maps.Controls.GeoMapLocationPane
member.summary:
Represents map location pane that provides a set of information about location of a mouse cursor in the control.
Location can be displayed in different coordinate systems and formats such as:
Geographic Degree-Minute-Seconds, Geographic Decimal Degrees, Map Window Coordinates, or Map Mouse Coordinates
